projectDescription: Climate narratives are often shaped by ideology and confusion, making it easy to lose sight of whatâ€™s truly at stake. This project seeks to undo our biases and reground the climate narrative in real data to give readers a fresh view of this thoroughly discussed topic.

articles.title: The Carbon Footprint Story
articles.description: As one of the most politicised issues in history, it has become hard to be level headed when it comes to climate change. The carbon footprint story is one of the best examples of how the story of climate change has been endlessly skewed to fit the narrative of those telling it.

projectDescription: A project to help people understand the scale of carbon emissions.

articles.title: Political Donations Revealed
articles.description: A story transforming public data on politicians declared interests into a cohesive and accessible narrative, revealing ties between elected officials and powerful interests.
